name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-outgoing-webhook-csharp
title: Outgoing webhook in C#
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to implement a straightforward Outgoing Webhook for Microsoft Teams, allowing users to send messages to external services without the complexity of creating a full bot.
longDescription: The Outgoing Webhook Sample C# project provides a simple way for Microsoft Teams to interact with external applications through HTTP POST requests. By integrating an outgoing webhook, users can send messages and receive rich responses, enhancing their Teams experience without the need for a full bot implementation.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing outgoing webhook in c#

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
